verses.verse: מִ֤י <WH4310> O יִתֶּנְךָ֙ <WH5414> O that כְּאָ֣ח <WH251> thou [wert] as my brother לִ֔י יוֹנֵ֖ק <WH3243> that sucked שְׁדֵ֣י <WH7699> the breasts אִמִּ֑י <WH517> of my mother אֶֽמְצָאֲךָ֤ <WH4672> [when] I should find בַחוּץ֙ <WH2351> thee without אֶשָּׁ֣קְךָ֔ <WH5401> I would kiss גַּ֖ם <WH1571> either לֹא־ <WH3808> No יָב֥וּזוּ <WH936> thee yea I should not be despised לִֽי׃

אֶנְהָֽגֲךָ֗ <WH5090> I would lead אֲבִֽיאֲךָ֛ <WH935> thee [and] bring אֶל־ <WH413> into בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house אִמִּ֖י <WH517> thee into my mother's תְּלַמְּדֵ֑נִי <WH3925> [who] would instruct אַשְׁקְךָ֙ <WH8248> me I would cause thee to drink מִיַּ֣יִן <WH3196> wine הָרֶ֔קַח <WH7544> of spiced מֵעֲסִ֖יס <WH6071> of the juice רִמֹּנִֽי׃ <WH7416> of my pomegranate
שְׂמֹאלוֹ֙ <WH8040> His left hand תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> be under רֹאשִׁ֔י <WH7218> [should be] under my head וִֽימִינ֖וֹ <WH3225> and his right hand תְּחַבְּקֵֽנִי׃ <WH2263> should embrace

הִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <WH7650> I charge אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> you O daughters יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem מַה־ <WH4100> not תָּעִ֧ירוּ ׀ <WH5782> that ye stir not up וּֽמַה־ <WH4100> or תְּעֹֽרְר֛וּ <WH5782> nor awake אֶת־ <WH853> הָאַהֲבָ֖ה <WH160> [my] love עַ֥ד <WH5704> Until שֶׁתֶּחְפָּֽץ׃ <WH2654> until he please ס

מִ֣י <WH4310> Who זֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise עֹלָה֙ <WH5927> Who [is] this that cometh up מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> from the wilderness מִתְרַפֶּ֖קֶת <WH7514> leaning עַל־ <WH5921> and דּוֹדָ֑הּ <WH1730> beloved תַּ֤חַת <WH8478> Thahash הַתַּפּ֙וּחַ֙ <WH8598> thee up under the apple tree עֽוֹרַרְתִּ֔יךָ <WH5782> awakened שָׁ֚מָּה <WH8033> There חִבְּלַ֣תְךָ <WH2254> brought thee forth אִמֶּ֔ךָ <WH517> there thy mother שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> There חִבְּלָ֥ה <WH2254> there she brought thee forth יְלָדַֽתְךָ׃ <WH3205> [that] bare

שִׂימֵ֨נִי <WH7760> Set כַֽחוֹתָ֜ם <WH2368> me as a seal עַל־ <WH5921> over לִבֶּ֗ךָ <WH3820> upon thine heart כַּֽחוֹתָם֙ <WH2368> as a seal עַל־ <WH5921> over זְרוֹעֶ֔ךָ <WH2220> upon thine arm כִּֽי־ <WH3588> is as עַזָּ֤ה <WH5794> [is] strong כַמָּ֙וֶת֙ <WH4194> as death אַהֲבָ֔ה <WH160> for love קָשָׁ֥ה <WH7186> [is] cruel כִשְׁא֖וֹל <WH7585> as the grave קִנְאָ֑ה <WH7068> jealousy רְשָׁפֶ֕יהָ <WH7565> the coals רִשְׁפֵּ֕י <WH7565> thereof [are] coals אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> of fire שַׁלְהֶ֥בֶתְיָֽה׃ <WH7957> [which hath a] most vehement flame

מַ֣יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּ֗ים <WH7227> Many לֹ֤א <WH3808> Nor יֽוּכְלוּ֙ <WH3201> cannot לְכַבּ֣וֹת <WH3518> quench אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאַהֲבָ֔ה <WH160> love וּנְהָר֖וֹת <WH5104> neither can the floods לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יִשְׁטְפ֑וּהָ <WH7857> drown אִם־ <WH518> If יִתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> would give אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> it if [a] man אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all ה֤וֹן <WH1952> all the substance בֵּיתוֹ֙ <WH1004> of his house בָּאַהֲבָ֔ה <WH160> for love בּ֖וֹז <WH936> it would utterly יָב֥וּזוּ <WH936> be contemned לֽוֹ׃ ס

אָח֥וֹת <WH269> sister לָ֙נוּ֙ קְטַנָּ֔ה <WH6996> We have a little וְשָׁדַ֖יִם <WH7699> and she hath no breasts אֵ֣ין <WH369> has לָ֑הּ מַֽה־ <WH4100> What נַּעֲשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> what shall we do לַאֲחֹתֵ֔נוּ <WH269> for our sister בַּיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> in the day שֶׁיְּדֻבַּר־ <WH1696> when she shall be spoken for בָּֽהּ׃

אִם־ <WH518> If חוֹמָ֣ה <WH2346> If she [be] a wall הִ֔יא <WH1931> We נִבְנֶ֥ה <WH1129> we will build עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> on טִ֣ירַת <WH2918> upon her a palace כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> of silver וְאִם־ <WH518> if דֶּ֣לֶת <WH1817> and if she [be] a door הִ֔יא <WH1931> We נָצ֥וּר <WH6696> we will inclose עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> her with ל֥וּחַ <WH3871> her with boards אָֽרֶז׃ <WH730> of cedar

אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I חוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> I [am] a wall וְשָׁדַ֖י <WH7699> and my breasts כַּמִּגְדָּל֑וֹת <WH4026> like towers אָ֛ז <WH227> Then הָיִ֥יתִי <WH1961> became בְעֵינָ֖יו <WH5869> then was I in his eyes כְּמוֹצְאֵ֥ת <WH4672> as one that found שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> favour פ

כֶּ֣רֶם <WH3754> had a vineyard הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> had לִשְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> Solomon בְּבַ֣עַל הָמ֔וֹן <WH1174> at Baalhamon נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> he let out אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֖רֶם <WH3754> the vineyard לַנֹּטְרִ֑ים <WH5201> unto keepers אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> every one יָבִ֥א <WH935> thereof was to bring בְּפִרְי֖וֹ <WH6529> for the fruit אֶ֥לֶף <WH505> a thousand כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> [pieces] of silver

כַּרְמִ֥י <WH3754> My vineyard שֶׁלִּ֖י לְפָנָ֑י <WH6440> which [is] mine [is] before הָאֶ֤לֶף <WH505> [must have] a thousand לְךָ֙ שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> me thou O Solomon וּמָאתַ֖יִם <WH3967> thereof two hundred לְנֹטְרִ֥ים <WH5201> and those that keep אֶת־ <WH853> פִּרְיֽוֹ׃ <WH6529> the fruit

הַיּוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> Thou that dwellest בַּגַּנִּ֗ים <WH1588> in the gardens חֲבֵרִ֛ים <WH2270> the companions מַקְשִׁיבִ֥ים <WH7181> hearken לְקוֹלֵ֖ךְ <WH6963> to thy voice הַשְׁמִיעִֽינִי׃ <WH8085> cause me to hear

בְּרַ֣ח ׀ <WH1272> Make haste דּוֹדִ֗י <WH1730> my beloved וּֽדְמֵה־ <WH1819> and be thou like לְךָ֤ לִצְבִי֙ <WH6643> to a roe א֚וֹ <WH176> or לְעֹ֣פֶר <WH6082> or to a young הָֽאַיָּלִ֔ים <WH354> hart עַ֖ל <WH5921> on הָרֵ֥י <WH2022> upon the mountains בְשָׂמִֽים׃ <WH1314> of spices
